mean_en: having the ability to know or understand things without any proof or evidence :having or characterized by intuition
sentence: He has an intuitive sense that he should cut the blue wire to disarm the bomb.
sentence_trans: 他有一种直觉，剪断蓝色的线能够拆除炸弹。
word_etyma: in不 + tuit监护 + ive形容词后缀，...的 → intuitive直觉的
